title: Does My Phone Come with an Accelerometer? How Do I Use It?
answer:
Yes, your phone comes with an accelerometer for entertainment purposes. If the  

accelerometer is enabled, your phone automatically changes its screen orientation when you  

turn the phone sideways. This enables you to watch videos on your phone in landscape mode  

or install accelerometer-based games. To enable the accelerometer, touch > Settings >  

Display, and select Auto-rotate screen.
